full_summary:
## Tender Notice for Twin-Otter Aircraft Services

### Announcement Details

* **Title**: Copy of Twin-Otter Aircraft Services
* **Reference Number**: WS4248093432-Doc4334493774
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4248093432
* **Publication Date**: [01 December 2023](https://www.google.ca/search?q=01+December%202023)
* **Closing Date**: [19 December 2023](https://www.google.ca/search?q=19+December%202023&q=&aqs=chrome..69i57j0i433i512l4j0i131i433i512j0i433i512l2.3458j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8) (2:00 PM EST)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)

### Notice Type and Method

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: [01 January 2024](https://www.google.ca/search?q=01+January%202024)
* **Expected Contract End Date**: [31 December 2024](https://www.google.ca/search?q=31+December%202024)

### Services Required

The Department of Natural Resources (DNR), Natural Resources Canada, requires the services of a DeHavilland DHC-6 Twin Otter 300 Series Aircraft or equivalent to support its field operations in the Canadian Arctic, the Arctic Ocean, Greenland, and Alaska for the field season years 2024 and optional 2025, 2026, 2027, and 2028. The proposed aircraft must meet or exceed the DeHavilland DHC-6 Twin Otter 300 Series Aircraft specifications.

### Mandatory Requirements

* The base locations for the service are Resolute, Nunavut; Iqaluit, Nunavut; and Inuvik, Northwest Territories.
* The main base of operations is Resolute, Nunavut.
* Resolute controls all the flight operations conducted across the three locations.

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Jiang, Kevin (SPAC/PSPC) 
* **Contact Email**: kevin.jiang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

You can access the complete tender notice and any attachments
